languages.text: {n}Дрожащим пальцем ткач указывает на труп Хротко.{/n} "Этот когда-то был верен, хоть и... горд... Но его разум... отравили... Один укус — и предательство... уже в... крови... Никому не верь".

{n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."
languages.original_text: {n}Дрожащим пальцем ткач указывает на труп Хротко.{/n} "Этот когда-то был верен, хоть и... горд... Но его разум... отравили... Один укус — и предательство... уже в... крови... Никому не верь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The weaver points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one used to be loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes one bite… to put... treachery... In the blood... Trust no one."

{n}The weaver points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one used to be loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes one bite… to put... treachery... In the blood... Trust no one."

{n}The weaver points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was always loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite… to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

{n}The weaver points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was always loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite… to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

{n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

{n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

languages.text: {n}El tejedor señala al cadáver de Hrotko con un dedo tembloroso.{/n} «Antes era leal, a pesar de su... orgullo... Pero su mente... quedó... envenenada. Solo hace falta un mordisco... para introducir... la traición... en la sangre... No confíe en nadie».
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tejedor señala al cadáver de Hrotko con un dedo tembloroso.{/n} «Antes era leal, a pesar de su... orgullo... Pero su mente... quedó... envenenada. Solo hace falta un mordisco... para introducir... la traición... en la sangre... No confíe en nadie».

languages.text: {n}紡績工は、震える指でフロトコの死体を指差す。{/n}「この者はかつて忠実でした…高慢ではあったけれど…でも彼の心は…毒された。ガブリとひと噛みで…血から…裏切り者に…誰も信用しては、いけない」
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィーヴァーは、震える指でフロトコの死体を指差す。{/n}「この者はかつて忠実でした…高慢ではあったけれど…でも彼の心は…毒された。ガブリとひと噛みで…血から…裏切り者に…誰も信用しては、いけない」

languages.text: {n}织网者用颤抖的手指，指着赫洛卡的尸体。{/n}“这个人以前很忠诚……很高傲……但他的思想……遭到了……毒害。只要一口……背叛就会……印入……血脉之中……不要相信任何人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

traits.locale_text: {n}织网者用颤抖的手指，指着赫洛卡的尸体。{/n}“这个人以前很忠诚……很高傲……但他的思想……遭到了……毒害。只要一口……背叛就会……印入……血脉之中……不要相信任何人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Spinner deutet mit zitterndem Finger auf Hrotkos Leiche.{/n} "Er war einst ... loyal, wenn auch ... stolz ... Doch sein Verstand ... wurde ... vergiftet. Es reicht ein Biss ... um Verrat ... in das Blut zu treiben ... Vertraut niemandem."
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Spinner deutet mit zitterndem Finger auf Hrotkos Leiche.{/n} "Er war einst ... loyal, wenn auch ... stolz ... Doch sein Verstand ... wurde ... vergiftet. Es reicht ein Biss ... um Verrat ... in das Blut zu treiben ... Vertraut niemandem."

languages.text: {n}Le tisseur désigne le corps d'Hrotko d'un doigt tremblant.{/n} « Celui-ci était loyal, bien que... orgueilleux. Mais son esprit... a été empoisonné. Il suffit d'une bouchée... pour imprégner le sang... de trahison... Ne faites confiance à personne. »
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le tisseur désigne le corps d'Hrotko d'un doigt tremblant.{/n} « Celui-ci était loyal, bien que... orgueilleux. Mais son esprit... a été empoisonné. Il suffit d'une bouchée... pour imprégner le sang... de trahison... Ne faites confiance à personne. »

languages.text: {n}Dokur, titreyen parmağıyla Hrotko'nun cesedini gösteriyor.{/n} "Şuradaki bir zamanlar sadıktı... Hatta gururluydu... Ama aklı... Zehirlendi. Kana... İhanet... Aşılamaya... Tek ısırık yeter... Kimseye güvenmeyin."
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points at Hrotko's corpse with a trembling finger.{/n} "This one was once loyal, if... prideful... But his mind... was... poisoned. It takes only one bite... to put... treachery... in the blood... Trust no one."
